name: sistine
description: Turn a MacBook into a Touchscreen with $1 of Hardware
readme_summary: Project Sistine transforms a MacBook into a touchscreen by using its built-in webcam and a small mirror to detect finger proximity and touches on the screen. It leverages computer vision techniques to translate the video feed into usable touch input, requiring minimal hardware.
key_features: Utilizes computer vision for touch detection
primary_use_case: To enable touchscreen functionality on a MacBook using its existing webcam and a simple hardware modification.
cover_image_prompt: A 3D isometric illustration of a MacBook with a small, angled mirror positioned above its webcam. The mirror reflects a finger hovering just above the laptop screen, with glowing digital particles emanating from the finger and being captured by the webcam's reflection. The MacBook screen displays a simple, interactive interface. Subtle UI elements and lines of code are visible on a small side monitor, indicating the software processing the input. The overall mood is innovative and accessible, with a clean, modern aesthetic and a soft, focused light source. The composition clearly shows the reflection being used as the input for the screen, with the repository name 'Sistine' subtly integrated into the scene's design.

name: Migrate-OSS
readme_summary: Migrate-OSS is an Android application designed for backing up and restoring essential user data, including call logs, SMS messages, and contacts. It aims to provide a reliable way for users to safeguard their personal information and transfer it between devices or after system resets.
key_features: Backup and restore call log history
Planned features include calendar entries backup, password protection, and root-based app/system feature backup
primary_use_case: Mobile data backup and restoration for Android devices.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, antique wooden chest overflowing with digital icons representing phone data: call logs, SMS bubbles, and contact cards. A gentle beam of light shines down on the chest, illuminating the icons. In the background, a subtle, abstract representation of a smartphone screen displays a progress bar, indicating a backup process. The overall mood is secure and trustworthy, with a clean, slightly futuristic aesthetic. The scene should be rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing the concept of safeguarding valuable digital information.

name: RadioPlayerV3
description: An Advanced Telegram Bot to Play Radio & Music in Voice Chat.  This is Also The Source Code of The Bot Which is Being Used For Playing Radio in @AsmSafone Channel ❤️  https://radiostay.com - over 100000 online radio stations around the world
readme_summary: RadioPlayerV3 is an advanced Python-based Telegram bot designed to stream music and radio directly into group or channel voice chats. It supports playlists, 24/7 radio streaming, YouTube Live, and offers features like persistent playback and interactive controls.
key_features: Playlist with queuing and 24/7 radio support
Auto-fallback to radio when playlist ends
Interactive controls via buttons and commands
Dynamic VC title updates with song name
Pre-download next tracks for smooth playback
primary_use_case: Streaming music and radio content into Telegram group/channel voice chats.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant, modern illustration of a Telegram chat bubble transforming into a dynamic sound wave that flows into a stylized microphone within a group voice chat icon. The sound wave is composed of musical notes and tiny radio towers, symbolizing the seamless integration of radio and music streaming. Subtle digital particles emanate from the chat bubble, indicating the bot's AI-driven functionality. The background features a clean, abstract representation of a global network, highlighting the worldwide radio station access. The overall mood is energetic and connected, with a color palette of blues, purples, and glowing accents. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear iconography and smooth gradients.

name: gitlogue
description: A cinematic Git commit replay tool for the terminal, turning your Git history into a living, animated story.
readme_summary: gitlogue is a terminal-based tool that transforms your Git commit history into a cinematic, animated replay. It visualizes code changes with realistic typing animations, syntax highlighting, and file tree transitions, making code evolution a visual experience.
primary_use_case: Visualizing and replaying Git commit history in a cinematic, animated format within the terminal.
cover_image_prompt: A vintage film projector is set up in a dimly lit, cozy study. Instead of a movie reel, the projector is spooling a glowing, animated Git commit history. The projected light illuminates the wall, showing code snippets unfolding with realistic typing animations and syntax highlighting, as if a story is being told. Small, stylized file tree icons are visible within the projected light, representing the project structure. Subtle digital particles emanate from the projector, connecting the cinematic metaphor to software development. The repository name 'gitlogue' is subtly embossed on the side of the projector. The overall mood is nostalgic yet technologically advanced, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a warm, inviting color palette.

name: CyberScraper-2077
description: A Powerful web scraper powered by LLM | OpenAI, Gemini & Ollama
readme_summary: CyberScraper 2077 is an AI-powered web scraping tool that leverages LLMs like OpenAI, Gemini, and Ollama to extract data from the internet with high precision. It offers both a traditional scraping branch with advanced features and an enterprise-grade integration with the Scrapeless SDK.
key_features: Multi-Format Support (JSON, CSV, HTML, SQL, Excel)
primary_use_case: Automated and intelligent web data extraction using AI and LLMs.
cover_image_prompt: A futuristic netrunner, depicted as a skilled artisan, is meticulously weaving a tapestry of digital information. They are using a glowing, AI-infused loom where raw web pages (represented by chaotic streams of code and images) are fed in. The loom intelligently sorts and structures this data, outputting perfectly organized, glowing threads of JSON, CSV, and Excel files. Subtle UI elements showing data parsing and LLM prompts are visible on the netrunner's holographic interface. The scene is set in a neon-lit, cyberpunk data hub with a dark, moody atmosphere. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, contrasting colors and a focus on the intricate details of the data weaving process.

name: dexter
description: An autonomous agent for deep financial research
readme_summary: Dexter is an autonomous financial research agent built with TypeScript that leverages task planning, self-reflection, and real-time market data to answer complex financial questions. It breaks down queries, executes research using various tools, validates its findings, and synthesizes data-backed answers.
primary_use_case: Performing deep, autonomous financial research and analysis to answer complex financial queries.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, robotic owl perched on a stack of financial reports and glowing data streams. The owl is using its keen eyes, enhanced with digital overlays, to meticulously examine intricate charts and graphs projected in the air. Below, a complex financial question is being deconstructed into smaller, manageable puzzle pieces that the owl is assembling. Subtle UI elements showing data points and analysis progress are visible on small holographic screens around the owl. The scene is set in a modern, dimly lit library with a backdrop of a dynamic stock market ticker. The overall mood is one of intelligent inquiry and discovery. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a sophisticated color palette of deep blues, golds, and subtle greens, emphasizing clarity and depth.
